name: Beppo's Hole
description:
You find yourself once again mired in Beppo's Hole. All you can do is head higher and higher, through the rain of meatballs and hoping that the friendly faces can guide you out to safety.

Controls:
A and D to move left and right.
Spacebar to jump.
W to eat meatballs
Q and E to regurgitate left and right.

If you find yourself unable to vomit, consuming a lot of food usually helps.

Made for the Idle Thumbs Forums Wizard Jam
Featuring sound effects by Patrick R
And traced art from Blambo, Big JKO and atte.
